paragraph: Nikhil Warankar & Co is an Accounting, Auditing & Consulting firm with a well-established network of financial experts across India. Our motto 'Step ahead, Always', reflects our value-added approach in delivering sound financial solutions while we partner with you in your journey of growth. With our extensive experience of 65+ years, we deliver a wide range of professional services in the areas of Assurance, Accounting & Advisory to reputed & listed companies from various industries across the globe.
heading: Delivering Quality Assurance and Financial Solutions since 1956

header.title: Why Nikhil Warankar & Co?
header.paragraph: Nikhil Warankar & Co are committed to establishing and nurturing long-term relationships that illustrate our experience and aptitude of years to assist our clients to accomplish real attainment.

sections.title: Tailor-Made Approach
sections.description: Our accredited partners and dedicated staff bring professionalism and specialization to cater to each client’s unique needs. With a focus on personalized service, we surpass expectations by infusing integrity and delivering customized solutions.

sections.title: Ethical Practices
sections.description: Our firm with an unwavering commitment to ethics, upholding high values in every aspect of our work. We consistently exceed client expectations while maintaining integrity as our guiding principle.

sections.title: Partnering Growth
sections.description: Nikhil Warankar & Co, spanning across territories, approaches every endeavor with the same standard of enthusiasm, integrity, and ethical practices. We forge partnerships that foster growth, leveraging expertise with a global perspective.

sections.title: Robust Frameworks
sections.description: Professionalism is at the core of Kirtane & Pandit’s promise, ensuring strong practices in all our professional engagements. Our sincere team works tirelessly for the betterment of our clients.

sections.title: Global Perspective
sections.description: With Nikhil Warankar & Co, clients benefit from our global perspective and exposure to diverse industries. We bring new experiences and insights, working within timelines to provide the best results.

services.title: Direct Taxes
services.description: Our Direct Tax services include comprehensive planning and compliance for various tax obligations. We help businesses navigate complex regulations to optimize their tax positions.

services.title: Indirect Taxes
services.description: Our Indirect Tax services cover Goods and Services Tax (GST) compliance, advisory, and litigation support to ensure that businesses are compliant with indirect tax regulations.

services.title: Statutory and Internal Auditing
services.description: We provide statutory and internal auditing services to assess the accuracy of financial statements and compliance with applicable laws, enhancing your business's transparency.

services.title: Limited Review
services.description: Our Limited Review services offer a quick assessment of financial statements for interim periods, providing stakeholders with assurance on financial health without a full audit.

services.title: Project Finances
services.description: We assist in project finance by structuring financial arrangements and advising on financial strategy, ensuring the success of your projects.

services.title: Auditing & Assurance Services
services.description: We provide various Auditing & Assurance Services to Companies and Firms.
services.largeParagraph: Our Auditing & Assurance Services include verification of evidences, vouchers, and certifications. We help companies maintain compliance through detailed audits and documentation.

services.title: Outsourcing & Payroll Processing
services.description: Outsourcing helps companies to focus on core activities and achieve high compliance.
services.largeParagraph: We provide a comprehensive range of outsourcing services that include accounting, payroll processing, and QuickBooks management to help businesses maintain operational efficiency.

services.title: Income Tax Advisory
services.description: We provide income tax advice to companies and non-companies clients.
services.largeParagraph: Our Income Tax Advisory service helps clients optimize their tax strategies. We provide expert advice on income tax compliance for businesses as well as individuals.

services.title: Virtual CFO Services
services.description: Fast-growing businesses need dynamic support in financial decisions.
services.largeParagraph: Our Virtual CFO Services provide expert financial advice and oversight to businesses that need CFO-level guidance without hiring full-time CFO staff.

services.title: Indian GAAPs, IND-AS & IFRS Advisory Services
services.description: We assist businesses in implementing IFRS and Indian GAAPs.
services.largeParagraph: Our services help companies comply with the complex landscape of Indian GAAPs, IND-AS, and IFRS. We provide expert advisory for financial reporting and corporate governance.

services.title: Initial Public Offering (IPO) Advisory & Solutions Services
services.description: We provide advisory for companies aiming for IPO on NSE & BSE.
services.largeParagraph: Our IPO advisory services help businesses prepare for listing on major stock exchanges, providing comprehensive guidance on regulatory requirements and documentation.
